mapper.insert: insert into review(review_no, review_score, review_title, review_content, movie_no) values (review_seq.nextval, #{reviewScore}, #{reviewTitle}, #{reviewContent}, #{movieNo})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM review ORDER BY review_date DESC

SELECT a.* FROM ( SELECT a.*, rownum rn FROM ( SELECT * FROM review WHERE LOWER(review_title) LIKE '%' || #{reviewTitle} || '%' ORDER BY review_no DESC ) a WHERE rownum <= #{endNum} ) a WHERE rn >= #{startNum}
SELECT a.* from (SELECT a.*, rownum rn from ( SELECT * from review order by review_no desc) a where rownum <= #{end} ) a where rn >= #{start}
SELECT count(*) FROM review where review_title = #{reviewTitle}
SELECT count(*) FROM review where review_title like '%'||#{reviewTitle}||'%'
mapper.update: update review set review_views = review_views + 1 where review_no = #{reviewNo}
